ack.title: ACKNOWLEDGMENTS
ack.p: We wish to thank the British Trust for Ornithology (BTO) for providing the bulk of the data used in this analysis. The BTO Ringing Scheme is funded by a partnership of the British Trust for Ornithology, the Joint Nature Conservation Committee (on behalf of: Natural England, Natural Resources Wales and Scottish Natural Heritage and the Department of the Environment Northern Ireland), The National Parks and Wildlife Service (Ireland), and the ringers themselves. We also thank the many ringers who contributed data to the BTO, as well as R. W. Furness and three anonymous reviewers for their valuable comments on drafts.
